enumDescriptions: Export the document to specific format.

format.description: The format(s) to export the document to. Defaults to `pdf`.

oneOf.description: The format to export the document to.
The formats to export the document to.

items.description: The format to export the document to. Defaults to `pdf`.

inputPath.title: Input path
inputPath.description: The path pattern to the entry file (main) for compilation, you can use `$focused`, `$root`, `$dir`, `$name` to do magic configuration, e.g. `$dir/$name` (default) and `$root/target/$dir/$name`. A special value `$focused` is used to point to the currently focused file in the editor.

metadata.description: Whether to generate metadata containing export arguments.

pdf.creationTimestamp.description: The unix timestamp of the PDF creation. If not specified, the current time is used.

png.ppi.description: The PPI (pixels per inch) to use for PNG export

merged.description: Merge the pages into a single image. Affected formats: `png`, `svg`

svg.merged.description: Merge the pages into a single SVG. Affected formats: `svg`

png.merged.description: Merge the pages into a single PNG. Affected formats: `png`

merged.gap.description: The gap between the pages when merging **with absolute typst unit**. Affected formats: `png`, `svg`

svg.merged.gap.description: The gap between the pages when merging **with absolute typst unit**. Affected formats: `svg`

png.merged.gap.description: The gap between the pages when merging **with absolute typst unit**. Affected formats: `png`

query.format.description: The format of the query output. Defaults to `json`.
enumDescriptions: Plain Text if the result is a string, otherwise raises an error. You may specific the field to use for the query with `query.field` and assert that there is only one result with `query.one`.

query.outputExtension.description: The extension of the query output. Inferring from `query.format` if not specified.

query.strict.description: Whether to strictly check the query format. Defaults to `true`.

query.pretty.description: Whether to pretty print the query output. Defaults to `true`.

query.selector.description: The selector to use for the query. Must specified if `format`.

query.field.description: The field to use for the query.

query.one.description: Whether to only return one result. Defaults to `false`.

tinymist.completion.symbol.title: The Way to complete symbols
tinymist.completion.symbol.markdownDescription: Whether to make symbol completion stepless. For example, `$ar|$` will be completed to `$arrow.r$`. Hint: Restarting the editor is required to change this setting.

semanticTokenTypes.description: List, enum, or term list marker
Delimiter of a different type of markup

program.description: Absolute path to a text file.

trace.description: Enable logging of the Debug Adapter Protocol.

compileError.description: Simulates a compile error in 'launch' request.
enumDescriptions: default: show fake compile error to user
show fake compile error to user
do not show fake compile error to user

configurationSnippets.label: Typst Debug: Launch
configurationSnippets.description: A new configuration for 'debugging' a user selected typst file.

commands.title: %extension.tinymist.command.tinymist.showLog%
commands.description: Show log of the language server

commands.title: Profile coverage of the current test module
%extension.tinymist.command.tinymist.browsingPreview%
commands.description: Open a preview panel to browsing through documents. The preview panel will pick a main file when switching between files. By default, every single file is a document. This doesn't work well with multiple-files projects. To allow tinymist learn the structure of your projects, please configure `tinymist.projectResolution` as `lockDatabase`.

commands.title: %extension.tinymist.command.typst-preview.browser%
commands.description: Launch typst-preview server and open the preview in your browser

commands.title: %extension.tinymist.command.typst-preview.preview-slide%
commands.description: Launch typst-preview server in slide mode

commands.title: %extension.tinymist.command.typst-preview.browser-slide%
commands.description: Launch typst-preview server in slide mode and open the preview in your browser

commands.title: %extension.tinymist.command.typst-preview.eject%
commands.description: Eject the preview panel to browser to get better performance

commands.title: %extension.tinymist.command.typst-preview.sync%
commands.description: Scroll preview to current cursor position

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly && editorLangId == typst && !suggestWidgetVisible && !editorHasMultipleSelections && vim.mode != 'Normal' && vim.mode != 'Visual' && vim.mode != 'VisualBlock' && vim.mode != 'VisualLine' && vim.mode != 'SearchInProgressMode' && vim.mode != 'CommandlineInProgress' && vim.mode != 'Replace' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionMode' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionInputMode' && vim.mode != 'SurroundInputMode'

scripts.build:syntax: cd ../../syntaxes/textmate && yarn run compile && yarn run bundle
scripts.build-base: yarn run build-web-base && yarn run build-system-base
scripts.compile-shared: yarn run build:syntax && yarn run build:l10n && yarn run build:frontend && node scripts/check-version.mjs && node scripts/postinstall.cjs && node scripts/config-man.mjs
scripts.compile:web: yarn run build-web-base -- --minify && yarn run compile-shared
scripts.compile:system: yarn run build-system-base -- --minify && yarn run compile-shared
scripts.test: vitest && rimraf test-dist/ && tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && node test-dist/test/runTests.js
